text:
Created attachment 27491
Simple PPTX with a master slide w/ footer text "Master footer is here"

Simple PPTX with a master slide w/ footer text "Master footer is here"

I hit this in Tika https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TIKA-712 but it sounds
like we need to fix it in POI first.

Ideally each slide's master slide would have the elements from its
corresponding master slide inlined, but if this is problematic, a fallback
would just be to see each master slide once.

The attached PPT has a slide whose master slide has "Master footer is here"
footer; you can see it rendered when you view this in Office.  But when I
extract text using Tika, the footer isn't included.

I also opened https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51803 for PPT files.
creator: lucene@mikemccandless.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text:
Fixed in r1173749.

Tika should pick up the change when upgraded to POI 3.8 beta 5 (or intermediate nightly)
Updated in r1173756 to be an option, which HSLF already had
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
